Question.Subject: What is the Pain Series on Encyclopedia Drama?
Question.Content: I got it linked from a friend, but I think it's actually a Rick Roll. Or something like that..
Question.ChosenAnswer: I get a headache of clicking on it. Have you ever see 2 girls 1 cup? 3 guys 1 hammer? BME pain olympics? 1 horse 1 man? church of fudge? zippocat? now imagine all them, and 100 things even worse, all in one jpeg. image (in other words, 1 SINGLE PHOTO)

Answer.Content: DUDE. Do NOT click on it. Unless of you want to be scarred for the rest of your life. All the disgustingness in the world in one jpeg. Nasty stuff.

I get a headache of clicking on it. Have you ever see 2 girls 1 cup? 3 guys 1 hammer? BME pain olympics? 1 horse 1 man? church of fudge? zippocat? now imagine all them, and 100 things even worse, all in one jpeg. image (in other words, 1 SINGLE PHOTO)
